name: Tangerine Haze
description: Tangerine Haze is a sativa-dominant hybrid that is treasured for its distinct citrus smell and taste. This clone-only sativa originated in the Netherlands with the union of G13 Haze and NYC Diesel, and since then its popularity has spread to Canada, Colorado, and the West Coast. The zesty tangerine aroma accented with floral notes may be the hallmark of this strain, but its elevating, stress-relieving effects are also cherished by patients and recreational consumers. Tangerine Haze is a top-choice for daytime enjoyment, as its effects stimulate the mind and allow functionality. Growers recommend a 65-day flowering period for Tangerine Haze, when its citrus flavor peaks.
descriptionPlain: Tangerine Haze is a sativa-dominant hybrid that is treasured for its distinct citrus smell and taste. This clone-only sativa originated in the Netherlands with the union of G13 Haze and NYC Diesel, and since then its popularity has spread to Canada, Colorado, and the West Coast. The zesty tangerine aroma accented with floral notes may be the hallmark of this strain, but its elevating, stress-relieving effects are also cherished by patients and recreational consumers. Tangerine Haze is a top-choice for daytime enjoyment, as its effects stimulate the mind and allow functionality. Growers recommend a 65-day flowering period for Tangerine Haze, when its citrus flavor peaks.

highlightedReviews.text: Have purchased 3 Vape Cartridges of Tangerine Haze. It does taste exactly like tangerines. The energetic euphoria, relaxation, pain relief and all around great feeling of this strain puts it in my top 5. Tangerine Haze is a daytime smoke into the evening. About an hour before bed I switch to an Indica. It's my best friends favorite also.
I liked it.  Nice and fresh feeling for daytime use.  Keeps me alert yet very stress free.  Tasty! I love the tangerine flavor.

articles.title: The 2014 San Francisco Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, cannabis enthusiasts flocked to the beautiful Bay Area of California to celebrate yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. Leafly was there (attendees, you scored a Leafly tank, right?) to witness the history unfold, and we return with news of your 2014 champions. Congratulations to all of the winners and to those who placed in their category!
 
 Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Cracker Jack – Santa Cruz Mountain Naturals
2nd Place: Silver Haze – MedMar Healing Center
3rd Place: Tangerine Haze – Heirloom Genetics
 
 Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Chem Scout – IC Collective
2nd Place: Paris OG – California Naturals
3rd Place: XXX OG Kush – Life Is Good Healing
 
 Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Thin Mint Cookies – Gold Coast Collection
2nd Place: Kush Company OG Kush – Wellness Earth Energy Dispensary – W.E.E.D Studio City
3rd Place: Deathstar – San Jose Patients Group
 
 Best Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Hell Raiser OG – TLC Collective / Gold Coast Extracts
2nd Place: XJ-13 Lemonhead – Alternative Herbal Health Services / Prime Extractions
3rd Place: J-1 – Nectar’s
 
Best Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Artisanal Cannabis Macarons – Madame Munchie
2nd Place: Hazelnug & Grub – Organicares Collective
3rd Place: Jambo – Jambo Direct
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Kottonmouth Kush x Strawberry Cough Ice Water Hash – Medibrothers
2nd Place: HGH Extractions Goji OG Solventless – Delta Health Center
3rd Place: BAMF Private Reserve Cookies – BAMF Extractions
 
Best High-CBD Cannabis Products
Flowers: Great White – Alpha Medic
Edibles: Medibrothers and MTG Medi-Chew High CBD – Medibrothers & MTG Seeds
Concentrates: Charlotte's Web – P.E.A.C.E. Plant Essentials And Cannabis Extracts
Photo credit: Thomas Hawk via Photopin CC

articles.title: New Strain Alert: Remedy, Tangerine Haze, Alice in Wonderland, Rockstar, Venom OG, and Sugar Plum
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
We have something for every canna-sseur in this week’s new strains: whether you’re looking for a high-CBD strain to tame your symptoms or an invigorating sativa for this weekend’s festivities, we have recommendations for you. Add these varieties to your strain scavenger hunt and let us know how it was in a review!
1. Remedy
Characteristics of Remedy:

75% indica
Cross between Cannatonic and Afghan Skunk
CBD levels as high as 15%
Less than 1% THC; little to no psychoactive effects
Lemon, pine, and floral aroma
Mellow relaxation throughout body; no cerebral effects
Patients report its success in treating pain, seizures, autism, inflammation, and anxiety
6 to 8 week flowering time

2. Tangerine Haze
Characteristics of Tangerine Haze:

60% sativa
Hybrid of G13 Haze and NYC Diesel
Citrus and floral aroma
Elevating and stimulating effects; stress relief
Good for daytime treatment of symptoms
65-day flowering period

3. Alice in Wonderland
Characteristics of Alice in Wonderland:

Sativa-dominant strain
Said to be a descendant of Willy’s Wonder
Cerebral, euphoric, creative, sharpened sensory experience
Patients typically use this strain to treat anxiety and depression

4. Rockstar
Characters of Rockstar: 

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Rock Bud and Sensi Star
Chemical, citrus, earthy aroma
Strong full-body effects without debilitating sedation
May be used to treat headaches, pain, and sleep disorders
56-63 day flowering period

5. Venom OG
Characteristics of Venom OG:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Poison OG and Rare Dankness #1
Skunk, pine, lemon, and diesel aroma
Full-body relaxation and sensory elevation
Good for pain, arthritis, anxiety, and sleep disorders

6. Sugar Plum
Characteristics of Sugar Plum:

90% sativa
Cross between Berkeley Blues and Hawaiian Haze Plum
Breeder: Stoney Girl Gardens
Tropical, earthy aroma
Hard-hitting, long-lasting cerebral effects
Patients typically use its high THC content for pain, nausea, glaucoma, mood disorders, and gastrointestinal disorders
35 day flowering period
